dta.VehicleClassGroup¶

class dta.VehicleClassGroup(name, classDefinitionString, colorCode)¶

Represents a group (or a set) of VehicleClasses, which are the classNames in VehicleType.

__init__(name, classDefinitionString, colorCode)¶

Constructor.

  • name is the vehicle class group name (e.g. All, No_Trucks)
  • classDefinitionString defines the class (either -, *, or a pipe-delimited set of vehicle classes
  • colorCode is a hex color code for drawing (e.g. #ffff00)

Methods

__init__ x.__init__(...) initializes x; see x.__class__.__doc__ for signature
VehicleClassGroup.allowsAll
VehicleClassGroup.allowsNone
VehicleClassGroup.getProhibited
allowsAll()¶

Return True if the vehicle class group allows all vehicle classes

allowsNone()¶

Return True if the vehicle class group allows all vehicle classes

classmethod getProhibited()¶

Return a vehicle class group object that prohibits all movements
